discover.title: Discover
discover.description: We start by deeply understanding your business, users, and goals. We research, analyze, and define the strategy that will guide the entire project.

design.title: Design
design.description: We create prototypes and designs that bring your vision to life. Every detail is carefully crafted to ensure an exceptional user experience.

develop.title: Develop
develop.description: We build your product with clean code, best practices, and modern technologies. Quality, performance, and scalability are our priorities.

deliver.title: Deliver
deliver.description: We launch your project successfully and provide ongoing support. Your success is our success, and we're here for the long term.

q1.question: How long does a typical project take?
q1.answer: Project timelines vary based on complexity. A simple website can take 4-6 weeks, while a full mobile app typically takes 3-6 months. We'll provide a detailed timeline during our initial consultation.

q2.question: What is your pricing model?
q2.answer: We offer flexible pricing models including fixed-price and time & materials. Pricing depends on project scope, complexity, and timeline. Contact us for a personalized quote tailored to your needs.

q3.question: Do you provide ongoing support?
q3.answer: Yes! We offer comprehensive maintenance packages that include bug fixes, updates, security patches, performance optimization, and feature enhancements. Your success is our priority.

q4.question: Can you work with our existing team?
q4.answer: Absolutely! We collaborate seamlessly with in-house teams, providing expertise where needed. We integrate smoothly into your workflow and complement your existing resources.

q5.question: What technologies do you specialize in?
q5.answer: We specialize in modern web and mobile technologies including React, Next.js, React Native, Node.js, TypeScript, PostgreSQL, and leading cloud platforms like Vercel and Supabase.

meta.title: UI/UX Design Services | Dream Studio
meta.description: User-centered design that combines aesthetics with functionality. We create beautiful interfaces that solve real problems.

hero.title: Product Design
hero.subtitle: User-centered design that combines aesthetics with functionality. We create interfaces that are not only beautiful but solve real problems and deliver exceptional user experiences.

process.title: Design Process
process.subtitle: Our proven methodology for creating exceptional digital experiences

research.title: Research & Discovery
research.description: We dive deep into understanding your users, market, and business goals. Through user interviews, competitive analysis, and data research, we build a solid foundation for design decisions.

wireframe.title: Wireframing & Architecture
wireframe.description: We map out the user journey and create low-fidelity wireframes to validate the structure and flow. This phase focuses on functionality and user experience before visual design.

design.title: Visual Design
design.description: We bring the wireframes to life with stunning visual designs. Every color, typography choice, and interaction is carefully crafted to create an engaging and cohesive experience.

prototype.title: Prototype & Testing
prototype.description: We build interactive prototypes and conduct usability testing with real users. This validates our design decisions and ensures the product meets user needs before development.

handoff.title: Development Handoff
handoff.description: We deliver detailed design specs, style guides, and assets to development teams. We collaborate closely to ensure the final product matches the design vision.

principles.title: Design Principles
principles.subtitle: The core values that guide our design work

userFirst.title: User-First Approach
userFirst.description: Every decision starts with the user. We design for real people with real needs, not just aesthetics.

simplicity.title: Simplicity & Clarity
simplicity.description: Complex doesn't mean complicated. We create intuitive interfaces that are easy to understand and use.

consistency.title: Consistency
consistency.description: Design systems that scale. We build consistent patterns and components for cohesive experiences.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Design for everyone. We ensure our products are usable by people of all abilities.

dataInformed.title: Data-Informed
dataInformed.description: Design backed by research. We validate decisions with user testing and analytics.

iterative.title: Iterative Process
iterative.description: Design is never done. We continuously improve based on feedback and data.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Product?
cta.subtitle: Let's create an experience your users will love

meta.title: Privacy Policy | Dream Studio
meta.description: Learn how Dream Studio collects, uses, and protects your personal information.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.p1: At Dream Studio, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services.
introduction.p2: Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the site or use our services.

collect.title: Information We Collect
collect.intro: We collect information that you provide directly to us when you:

name.title: Contact Information
name.desc: Name, email address, phone number, and company name

email.title: Communication Data
email.desc: Any information you provide when contacting us

phone.title: Project Details
phone.desc: Information about your project requirements and needs

technical.title: Technical Data
technical.desc: IP address, browser type, device information, and usage analytics

items.respond: Respond to your inquiries and provide customer service
items.services: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
items.improve: Understand how you use our website to improve user experience
items.communication: Send you updates, marketing communications (with your consent)

storage.title: Data Storage and Security
storage.p1: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information. Your data is stored securely using industry-standard encryption and security protocols.
storage.p2: We use Twenty CRM to manage contact information and Vercel for analytics. These third-party services have their own privacy policies governing the use of your information.

items.access: Access and receive a copy of your personal data
items.correct: Correct any inaccurate or incomplete information
items.delete: Request deletion of your personal data
items.opt: Opt-out of marketing communications at any time

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.p1: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our website and improve user experience. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.p1: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or want to exercise your rights, please contact us at:

meta.title: Terms of Service | Dream Studio
meta.description: Read our terms of service and understand the agreement between Dream Studio and our clients.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.p1: These Terms of Service govern your use of Dream Studio's website and services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms.

services.title: Our Services
services.p1: Dream Studio provides the following professional services:

items.web: Web application development using modern frameworks
items.mobile: Mobile application development for iOS and Android
items.design: UI/UX design and product design services

proposals.title: Proposals and Contracts
proposals.desc: All projects begin with a detailed proposal outlining scope, timeline, and costs. A signed contract is required before work begins.

timeline.title: Project Timeline
timeline.desc: Timelines are estimates and may vary based on project complexity and client responsiveness. Delays caused by late client feedback may extend the timeline.

changes.title: Scope Changes
changes.desc: Changes to project scope after contract signing may result in additional costs and timeline adjustments.

items.deposit: A deposit (typically 50%) is required before work begins
items.milestones: Payment milestones are outlined in the project proposal
items.late: Late payments may result in project suspension
items.refunds: Refunds are handled on a case-by-case basis

ip.title: Intellectual Property
ip.p1: Upon full payment, all deliverables and custom code become the property of the client. Dream Studio retains the right to showcase the project in our portfolio unless otherwise agreed.
ip.p2: We retain ownership of any pre-existing code, frameworks, or tools used in the project. The client receives a license to use these as part of the delivered solution.

warranties.title: Warranties and Support
warranties.p1: We provide a warranty period (typically 30-90 days) for bug fixes and issues directly related to our work. This does not cover changes to project requirements or third-party services.
warranties.p2: Ongoing maintenance and support can be arranged under a separate agreement.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.p1: Dream Studio is not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages. Our total liability is limited to the amount paid for services.

termination.title: Termination
termination.p1: Either party may terminate the agreement with written notice. The client is responsible for payment for all work completed up to the termination date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.p1: If you have questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:

seoContent.heading: Professional Web Development Agency - Custom Mobile App Development Solutions
seoContent.paragraph1: Dream Studio is a professional web development agency specializing in custom web applications, mobile app development, and cutting-edge SaaS solutions. Our expert team of React, Next.js, and React Native developers delivers high-performance digital products that drive real business results. As a leading web development agency, we combine technical excellence with exceptional design to create web applications and mobile apps that users love.
seoContent.paragraph2: Our web development agency serves startups, growing businesses, and enterprises looking to build scalable digital products. From custom web development projects to mobile app development for iOS and Android, we handle every aspect of your digital transformation. We specialize in React development, Next.js web applications, and React Native mobile apps, ensuring your product is built with modern, future-proof technologies that deliver exceptional performance and user experience.
seoContent.whyChooseHeading: Why Choose Our Web Development Agency
seoContent.paragraph3: As a professional web development agency, we pride ourselves on delivering projects that exceed expectations. Our custom web development approach means every web application and mobile app is tailored to your specific business needs. We don't use generic templates - our web developers create bespoke solutions that solve real problems. With expertise in React, Next.js, and React Native, our web development agency builds applications that are fast, scalable, and maintainable. We've helped companies achieve 40% faster load times, 90% client retention rates, and measurable ROI through our professional web development services.
seoContent.paragraph4: Our mobile app development services complement our web development expertise perfectly. Whether you need a native iOS app, Android application, or cross-platform React Native solution, our mobile app development team delivers apps with 4.3+ star ratings and thousands of downloads. We understand that mobile app development requires special attention to performance, user experience, and platform-specific best practices - and our agency excels in all these areas.
seoContent.expertiseHeading: Our Web Development & Mobile App Development Expertise
seoContent.paragraph5: Our web development agency offers comprehensive services including custom web application development, mobile app development, UI/UX design, backend development, API integration, and ongoing support. We work with modern technologies like React, Next.js, React Native, Node.js, TypeScript, and PostgreSQL to build enterprise-grade applications. Whether you need a landing page, SaaS platform, e-commerce site, or mobile app, our professional web developers deliver solutions that combine beautiful design with robust functionality. Contact our web development agency today for a free consultation and discover how we can transform your digital presence.
